name: Spider-Terror
description:
Story:

As the earthquake struck the City, people were frozen in terror at what they witnessed. A giant spider seeking out destruction, crawled out between the cracks of the demolished city ground. Better start running, before it's too late!

How to Play:

Collect points by rampaging through the city, upgrade your special spider powers to make you more powerful.

W, A, S, D - movement

leftclick - activate weapon

rightclick - special ability

Last Words:

Made by the "E-server" development team! We hope you have as much fun playing this, as we did making it!
